<title level="1" right="Rules">[Spell](/Rules.aspx?ID=3312)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 11 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Spells are magical effects created by performing mystical incantations and gestures known only to those with special training or inborn abilities. Casting a spell is an activity that usually uses 2 actions. Each spell specifies what it targets, the actions needed to cast it, its effects, and how it can be resisted. If a class grants spells, the basics of that ability are provided in the class description in [Chapter 3](/Rules.aspx?ID=2098), while the spells themselves are detailed in [Chapter 7](/Rules.aspx?ID=2221). 

 Spells have ranks ranging from 1st to 10th, which measure their power; characters and monsters can usually cast only a certain number of spells of any given rank.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
